_source.contentraw:
When Eric Garcetti won the mayors office in Los Angeles in 2013, Los Angeles lost; lost the last connections to the pre-boomer era of non-globalized capital.

The overt take over of Los Angeles politics by foreign intelligence and domestic billionaires, backing "progressive" candidates, feeds on the results of the failure of the Occupy movement in 2011 to obtain any redress for the grievances NAFTA, the repeal of Glass-Steagall, the Patriot Act, and the 1996 Telecommunications Act created.

Los Angeles is going to be dragged through a living version of hell for the next decade. There is no way out but down.

Not until the aqueducts fail and the power gets cut will this resolve itself in a manner that stands in accordance with an American system of government.

card.title: The FBI Plans To Lobby Congress For New Laws That Allow Them To Pursue Children As ‚ÄúDomestic Terrorists‚Äù | The Main Street Tribune

_source.content: The FBI Plans To Lobby Congress For New Laws That Allow Them To Pursue Children As ‚ÄúDomestic Terrorists‚ÄùThe FBI is calling on Congress to pass laws giving federal agents greater authority to prosecute children in relation to what it categorizes as domestic terrorism, according to the Bureau‚Äôs recently released Strategic Intelligence Assessment and Data on Domestic Terrorism. The report, which was presented to lawmakers last month, focuses primarily on the alleged threat landscape regarding what federal officials have dubbed ‚ÄúDomestic Violent Extremism,‚Äù or DVE. The assessment points out that federal domestic terrorism investigations grew to record highs during the relevant year of analysis, largely due to the mass classification of Donald Trump supporters arrested for entering the US Capitol on January 6th, 2021 as Domestic Violent Extremists.by Eric Strikerhttps://mainstreettribune.org/2022/11/the-fbi-is-lobbying-congress-for-laws-that-enable-them-to-pursue-children-as-domestic-terrorists
_source.contentraw:
The FBI Plans To Lobby Congress For New Laws That Allow Them To Pursue Children As ‚ÄúDomestic Terrorists‚Äù
The FBI is calling on Congress to pass laws giving federal agents greater authority to prosecute children in relation to what it categorizes as domestic terrorism, according to the Bureau‚Äôs recently released Strategic Intelligence Assessment and Data on Domestic Terrorism. The report, which was presented to lawmakers last month, focuses primarily on the alleged threat landscape regarding what federal officials have dubbed ‚ÄúDomestic Violent Extremism,‚Äù or DVE. The assessment points out that federal domestic terrorism investigations grew to record highs during the relevant year of analysis, largely due to the mass classification of Donald Trump supporters arrested for entering the US Capitol on January 6th, 2021 as Domestic Violent Extremists.
by Eric Striker
https://mainstreettribune.org/2022/11/the-fbi-is-lobbying-congress-for-laws-that-enable-them-to-pursue-children-as-domestic-terrorists
